name: Twin Space Ace
description:
Twin Space Ace is a 3D shoot'em up made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, pulling inspiration from many of the original retro shmups, like space invaders and galaga. This game pits you and a friend against an invading force of enemies. The two of you will need to control the main ship to take them down.

Gameplay Programmer/Artist/SFX/Modeler: Lucas Squassoni

Gameplay Designer: Sarah Vella

Main Level Soundtrack: sawsquarenoise (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise)

Controls:

P1 moves with WASD and fires with Space

p2 moves with arrow keys and fires with NumPad0
